English.Text: Your men are resolute following the speech. Your acting lieutenant points his sabre to the sky, defying the heavens themselves. "If I, born with gas light, heated water, a silver spoon in mouth..." with each fresh admission a cheer goes up, "If I, can enjoy chopping through these mangy pirates, then you lot will bloody well be in heaven!" There is a raucous cheer as the men prepare for orders.
